channel.title: Gta IV Copying Saints Row?
channel.description: anyone who has played saints row knows that you have a cell phone in which you can call the ambulence (if your too lazy to walk it off) if when you get hert, dial in cheat codes, call up homies, and call stores (no point in doing that but...) amd then GTA IV comes out it's a nice game and all but it has a cell phone were you can enter cheats, and ext. It's cool and all but i think they got it from Saints Row what do you think?

item.title: Gta IV Copying Saints Row?

item.description:

yeah i saw the previews i thought they would do better

item.title: Gta IV Copying Saints Row?
item.dc:creator: @killakj killakj
item.description:
@killakj wrote:

Thug-life:

Yeah but Saints row as a whole is just a huge rip of the older GTA’s.

yeah pretty much lol, but in my opinion i liked saints row better than the “past” gta games except san andreas
